article_title: Are You Ready for Cookbook Medicine?

article_metadata.description: Although it is not written anywhere in the Affordable Care Act, the designers of ObamaCare have a vision of how medicine should be practiced. Doctors they believe should follow protocols, designed by the profession’s best practitioners. They should practice medicine by following algorithms – which they find in a book [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
